title: Nico-chan Said What....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Is it really okay for me to play the piano in front of the kids?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Umm.... you don’t think I’ll scare them away?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Not at all~. I heard from Nico-chan, you know? That Cocoa-chan and the others grew attached to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeeh!? Did she really say that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. She was pretty sincere about it. She said, “Isn’t it cute how she’s so weak to kids?”~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>G-, geez, Nico-chaaan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Besides, I really want to sing along to your music, Maki-chan. So, please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....I guess it can’t be helped. Just for a little, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Sure! Just a little bit is fine! Thank you, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
